title: What can't poppy's w stop?
body: Someone give a last of all dashes her shield stops.

replies.body:
Steadfast Presence will stop only one dash per enemy champion per cast.
Steadfast Presence does not stop:
Diana's Lunar Rush (probable bug)
Fizz's Playful / Trickster
Hecarim's Onslaught of Shadows
Jarvan IV's Cataclysm
Kalista's Fate's Call
Malphite's Unstoppable Force
Maokai's Twisted Advance
Nocturne's Paranoia
Rek'Sai's Void Rush
Sion's Unstoppable Onslaught
Udyr's Bear Stance (possible bug)
Vi's Assault and Battery
Why would it stop Udyr's Bear stance? Bear stance is just a movement speed increase and stun on AA.
When she opens a can of Pringles the fun doesn't stop.
It can't stop a roundhouse kick delivered by Chuck Norris, nothing can. Pray he never becomes a champion.

> [{quoted}](name=Lemons22,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YkiJ7TPX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-16T12:12:59.836+0000)
>
> It can't stop a roundhouse kick delivered by Chuck Norris, nothing can. Pray he never becomes a champion.

Lee Sin.
google Arkadian Did you know poppy. There you go. It also doesnt stop blinks like ezreal, shaco, or flash.

It stops anything that is a dash, but isn't cc-immune like Vi and Malphite's ults. Anything that's actually a blink or provides intangibility is unaffected. Azir's wall functions the same way when determining whether or not something can pass through it.
